scripts.pull: cd client && git pull origin main && pnpm run build-only
scripts.backup-db: cd server/backup && "C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\pg_dump.exe" -U postgres -h localhost -p 5432 -F c -b -v -f dashboard_machine_backup.dump yamaha_dashboard_machine
scripts.push-db: pnpm run backup-db && git add . && git commit -m "backup db" && git push origin main
scripts.install:all: cd client && pnpm install && cd ../server && pnpm install
scripts.clean:all: cd client && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && cd ../server && rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json
